restaurant.name: Spice Aroma
restaurant.about: Welcome to Spice Aroma, where culinary tradition meets modern innovation. Since 2015, we have been delighting our guests with authentic recipes passed down through generations, combined with contemporary cooking techniques. Our mission is to bring you the finest flavours of traditional cuisine, prepared fresh daily using only the highest quality ingredients. Every dish tells a story, and we invite you to be part of our culinary journey.

items.name: Paneer Tikka
items.description: Grilled cottage cheese marinated in aromatic spices and yogurt. Served with mint chutney and lemon.

items.name: Samosa (3 pieces)
items.description: Crispy pastry triangles filled with spiced potatoes and peas. Traditional favorite with tamarind chutney.

items.name: Chicken 65
items.description: Spicy deep-fried chicken pieces coated with aromatic masala. A signature starter that's always in demand.

items.name: Vegetable Pakora
items.description: Mixed vegetables battered and deep-fried until golden. Served with mint yogurt dip.

items.name: Tandoori Prawns
items.description: Fresh prawns marinated in traditional tandoori spices and grilled to perfection.

items.name: Spring Rolls
items.description: Crispy rolls filled with vegetables and served with sweet and sour sauce.

items.name: Butter Chicken
items.description: Tender chicken in a creamy tomato-based sauce with hints of fenugreek. Served with basmati rice and naan.

items.name: Biryani (Chicken)
items.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with tender chicken and traditional spices. A complete meal on its own.

items.name: Palak Paneer
items.description: Cottage cheese cubes in a creamy spinach sauce. A classic vegetarian favorite, light yet satisfying.

items.name: Lamb Rogan Josh
items.description: Tender lamb pieces in a aromatic yogurt-based gravy with warm spices. Slow-cooked for maximum flavor.

items.name: Chole Bhature
items.description: Fluffy fried bread served with spiced chickpea curry. A hearty, beloved North Indian classic.

items.name: Fish Curry
items.description: Fresh fish cooked in coconut-based sauce with aromatic spices. Light, flavorful, and authentic.

items.name: Naan
items.description: Soft, fluffy Indian bread baked in tandoor. Perfect for scooping curries.

items.name: Garlic Naan
items.description: Naan topped with fresh garlic and herbs. Aromatic and delicious.

items.name: Roti
items.description: Thin, unleavened whole wheat bread. A daily essential with every meal.

items.name: Kulcha
items.description: Stuffed Indian bread with paneer and herbs. Rich and indulgent.

items.name: Puri
items.description: Deep-fried, puffy Indian bread. Light as air and perfect with any curry.

items.name: Paratha
items.description: Layered Indian flatbread cooked with ghee. Rich and satisfying.

items.name: Gulab Jamun
items.description: Soft milk solids balls in aromatic sugar syrup infused with rose water. A timeless favorite.

items.name: Kheer
items.description: Creamy rice pudding flavored with cardamom and topped with nuts. Comfort in a bowl.

items.name: Jalebi
items.description: Crispy, spiral-shaped sweet soaked in sugar syrup. A colorful treat.

items.name: Rasmalai
items.description: Soft cheese discs in sweetened, cardamom-flavored milk. Delicate and heavenly.

items.name: Mango Lassi
items.description: Creamy yogurt blended with fresh mango puree. Refreshing and satisfying.

items.name: Paan Kulfi
items.description: Traditional frozen dessert with essence of betel leaf. A unique cold treat.

items.name: Masala Tea (Chai)
items.description: Hot spiced tea with milk and aromatic spices. The perfect companion to any meal.

items.name: Mango Lassi
items.description: Creamy yogurt blended with fresh mango. A cool refreshment for warm days.

items.name: Iced Tea
items.description: Refreshing cold tea with lemon. A simple, classic beverage.

items.name: Sugarcane Juice
items.description: Fresh, natural sugarcane juice. Sweet, energizing, and healthy.

items.name: Fresh Lemonade
items.description: Tangy lemonade made from fresh lemons. Perfect for quenching your thirst.

items.name: Coffee
items.description: Rich, aromatic coffee. A warm drink for coffee lovers.
